about_the_game:
Journey to Mother Russia on a mission to save fellow liberals from the oppressive clutches of Gopnik Nationalism!


FEMINAZI: The Triggering - Mother Russia DLC features:

-Brand new playable map Misovostok
-15 new Slav collectibles in the new map for maximum immersion
-Authentic Slavdidas tracksuit collection and more Slavic fashion available in all colors
-Combat system - while in Russia, you will be able to scream your oppressors away but they will also hit back!
-Rescue fellow liberals by also screaming at the ropes that bind them
-Tolerance is now your health!
-Gopniks
-New minibosses!
-New leaderboard!
-18 new achievements!
-More memes!

name: FEMINAZI: Mother Russia DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible, at least 256MB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
